channel.title: How to fix compile errors/ execption errors in runserver
channel.description:
first of all if you have an error in compile saying "100 errors" or sumtin delete the last thing u edit and put the way it was back then compile agin shuld have no errors then update again......
if you had troubles with runserver and it says: "execption in thread, main java blah blah blah" just get the character files, and all the other files u updated cept last 1 (witch caused error) and put it on ur desktop.
then delete the source n re extract from winrar, then replace the files n put in the 1s u updated. :) :) :) :)

item.title: How to fix compile errors/ execption errors in runserver
item.dc:creator: @lacose lacose
item.description:
@lacose wrote:

Just leave… Waste of a new thread. If your going to posting something to help people make it helpful.

We apreciate you trieng though but you have to try harder…
